subtype.constraint.name: ap210_eaiapd_restrict_product_view_definition_subtypes
subtype.constraint.super.expression: ONEOF (Part_view_definition, Requirement_view_definition, Document_definition, Functional_unit_network_node_definition, Information_definition, Product_occurrence, Substance_view_definition)

subtype.constraint.name: ap210_physical_component_subtypes
subtype.constraint.super.expression: ONEOF (Assembly_module_component, Bare_die_component, Interconnect_module_component, Packaged_component, Routed_interconnect_component, Routed_physical_component)

subtype.constraint.name: ap210_part_usage_view_subtypes
subtype.constraint.super.expression: ONEOF (Package, Bare_die, Cable_usage_view, Packaged_part, Assembly_module_usage_view, Interconnect_module_usage_view)

where.label: WR1
WR2

where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( fund <* Physical_unit_network_definition | ('ASSEMBLY_MODULE_DESIGN_ARM.' + 'ASSEMBLY_MODULE_DESIGN_VIEW' IN TYPEOF (fund)) OR (SIZEOF(USEDIN(fund,'PHYSICAL_UNIT_SHAPE_WITH_PARAMETERS_ARM.' + 'PHYSICAL_UNIT_SHAPE_MODEL.SHAPE_CHARACTERIZED_DEFINITION')) = 0) )) = SIZEOF(Physical_unit_network_definition)
where.label: WR1
